title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-6.6 - Tissue processing facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-6.6 - Tissue processing facilities

State Regulations
A facility which processes skin shall be licensed by the department as a tissue processing facility. Such facilities shall make available to the department a statement of the procedures used in the preparation, testing and storage of the tissue or tissues distributed, or offered for use. The premises, equipment, procedures, records, circulars of instruction and tissues shall be available for inspection and/or testing by the department as required. Copies of all brochures and other informational materials and instructions, including descriptions of methods of tissue handling, shall be available to the department. Each container of tissue shall be clearly labeled with the donor identification code or a unique tissue identification number, unit size and expiration date, if applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

52-6.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
